definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: A big queue outside a shop in Mumbai where tins of vanaspati were sold, in 1973.
sentences.chinese: 1973年，在孟買一家人造黃油店外的一堆人。

sentences.english: You can find them in some margarines and prepared dishes.
sentences.chinese: 你可以找到他們在某些人造黃油和準備的菜餚。

sentences.english: Can you distinguish between butter and margarine?
sentences.chinese: 你能區別黃油和人造黃油嗎？

sentences.english: Therefore, some people use natural alternative to margarine and butter.
sentences.chinese: 因此有些人用人造黃油替代天然黃油。
使用無反式脂肪的人造黃油。

sentences.english: Do not use margarine, do not use semi-soft butter.
sentences.chinese: 不要用人造黃油和半軟黃油。
